description.narrative:
L’assistance technique est un soutien non financier fourni par des spécialistes. Elle peut revêtir plusieurs formes : partage d’information et de savoir-faire, formation et services-conseils.
L’assistance technique fournie dans le cadre du PEF est appelée aide ciblée aux pays. Ce type de soutien vise principalement à payer le personnel basé en permanence dans les bureaux pays des partenaires. Il repose sur la demande et les besoins identifiés par les pays eux-mêmes.

Technical assistance is non-financial support provided by specialists. It can take the form of sharing information and expertise, training and consulting services.
The technical assistance provided through PEF is called targeted country assistance (TCA). This type of support mainly consists of staff permanently based in partners’ country offices. It is based on the demand and needs identified by the countries themselves.

Cette activité détaille notre travail sur le Aide ciblée aux pays en Inde (l'), grâce à la mise à disposition des données budgétaires et des transactions. Nous fournissons également les documents pertinents qui guident ces activités que sont les formulaires de demande de soutien fournis par le gouvernement de Inde (l') ainsi que les lettres de décisions émises par Gavi, pour progresser. Ces documents décrivent les activités, les objectifs ainsi que les bénéficiaires.

This activity details our work on Targeted country assistance in India through the provision of budget and transaction data. We also provide the relevant documents that guide these activities, which are the support request proposal(s) provided by the Government of India, as well as the decision letter(s) issued by Gavi, for progress. These documents describe the activities, the objectives as well as the beneficiaries.

title.narrative: Directives concernant le processus mis en place au titre de l’aide ciblée aux pays dans le cadre du PEF
À propos de l’aide ciblée aux pays

condition.narrative: Conditions are detailed in the Partners’ engagement framework
Conditions are detailed in the Partners’ engagement framework

title.narrative: Technical officer and technical assistant in place to support immunization strengthening activities

target.value: Deployment of one technical officer and one technical assistant to support immunization strengthening activities
Deployment of one technical officer and one technical assistant to support immunization strengthening activities

title.narrative: District VPD surveillance workshops initiated within three months of state VPD surveillance workshop

target.value: District workshops for VPD surveillance Measles Rubella Surveillance review in three states
District workshops for VPD surveillance Measles Rubella Surveillance review in three states

title.narrative: Service delivery approach suitable to reach missed communities identified and endorsed

target.value: Strengthening immunization in 4 urban cities identified under Intensified Mission Indradhanush (IMI) but not included in HSS-2 proposal of immunization strengthening

title.narrative: Service delivery related barriers of missed communities to access immunisation services identified and prioritized

target.value: Strengthening immunization in 4 urban cities identified under Intensified Mission Indradhanush (IMI) but not included in HSS-2 proposal of immunization strengthening

title.narrative: Review completed in three states and feedback shared with MoHFW and state government for improvement

target.value: Measles Rubella Surveillance review in three states
Measles Rubella Surveillance review in three states

title.narrative: Lessons learnt from urban immunization strengthening documented for replication in the other 1067 NUHM cities

target.value: Strengthening immunization in 4 urban cities identified under Intensified Mission Indradhanush (IMI) but not included in HSS-2 proposal
Strengthening immunization in 4 urban cities identified under Intensified Mission Indradhanush (IMI) but not included in HSS-2 proposal
Strengthen concurrent immunization monitoring through field monitors focusses on identifying challenges and guide the crrective actions through task forces
Strengthen concurrent immunization monitoring through field monitors focusses on identifying challenges and guide the crrective actions through task forces

title.narrative: Service delivery approach suitable to reach missed communities identified and endorsed

target.value: Support MoH and State Govt. in planning and implementation of strategies, with focus on urban, very-hard to reach areas, tribal and deep rural, to address the issue of zero dose vaccination and under-vaccination including the impact of COVID-19 pandemic on routine immunization.

title.narrative: WhatsApp engagement strategy deployed in one state

target.value: Engaging Social Media platforms for demand generation on immunization with focus on WhatsApp
Engaging Social Media platforms for demand generation on immunization with focus on WhatsApp

title.narrative: High burden States Communication plan for M&R elimination developed

target.value: Support MoH in achieving the global commitment for eradication and elimination with focus on Measles and Rubella Elimination and introduction/scale-up of new vaccine

title.narrative: Plan to overcome vaccine demand-related barriers in high risk communities developed

target.value: Support MoH in reaching unreached - zero dose children/missed communities in urban and rural areas of selected states/districts of India

title.narrative: % of target sites achieving readiness to receive cold chain (e.g. equipment on site, ready and w/ trained staff).

target.value: Support in development of a plan for upgrading cold chain system towards a clean, green and energy efficient system

title.narrative: District specific Hard to reach area strategy rollout for 39 AD with emphasis of Cold chain strenghtening and Supportive Supervision

target.value: Support in rollout of MoH strategy for 'Intensification of Universal Immunization Programme including Mission Indradhanush' with a focus on UNICEF supported Aspirational Districts
Support in rollout of MoH strategy for 'Intensification of Universal Immunization Programme including Mission Indradhanush' with a focus on UNICEF supported Aspirational Districts

title.narrative: Capacity building of State level stakeholders in Tier 2 cities on Urban Communication planning, implementation and monitoring completed.

target.value: Support strengthen of urban immunization with focus on urban poor
Support strengthen of urban immunization with focus on urban poor

title.narrative: Final report on IDSP surveillance system evaluation and surveillance strengthening activities conducted.

target.value: CDC will provide technical assistance to better understand cholera disease burden and mapping of cholera hotspots by strengthening existing national surveillance mechanisms such as the integrated disease surveillance program (IDSP) of the Government of India. CDC will work in close collaboration with the Government of India (IDSP and the WHO country office).

CDC will provide technical assistance to better understand cholera disease burden and mapping of cholera hotspots by strengthening existing national surveillance mechanisms such as the integrated disease surveillance program (IDSP) of the Government of India. CDC will work in close collaboration with the Government of India (IDSP and the WHO country office).

title.narrative: Initial in-country mission and stakeholder discussions on cholera surveillance and existing platforms.

target.value: CDC will provide technical assistance to better understand cholera disease burden and mapping of cholera hotspots by strengthening existing national surveillance mechanisms such as the integrated disease surveillance program (IDSP) of the Government of India. CDC will work in close collaboration with the Government of India (IDSP and the WHO country office).
